Changelog
=========

0.1.0 (2016/06/22)
-------------------
-  HTML -> DITA conversion using Saxon or LXML

-------------------
-  tidy HTML document internally

-------------------
-  added html2dita()

0.0.10 (2016/06/21)
-------------------
- updated to DITA OT 2.3.1
- updated to DITAC 2.6.1

0.0.1 (03/01/2016)
------------------

- initial release
